donate.title: Donate
donate.location: Donations go to the Ukraine Humanitarian Appeal, Slava Ukraini!

info.title: Info
info.text: Lighterfuel allows you to see when profile images were uploaded to get an idea of when they made their account and reverse image search your matches photos!

reverseImageSearch.title: Reverse image search
reverseImageSearch.text: Enable the search button and click on it (only for matches) and see if that image is publicly available online (if it is, they're probably a catfish)

aprilfools.text: Want to swipe left on James? :( Click the left arrow once
